address: Yeouiseo-ro, Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul (behind the National Assembly)
description: In Yeouido, there is a 5,700-meter-long Cherry Blossom Avenue planted with more than 1,400 cherry trees. Seoul's famous Cherry Blossom Festival is held every April. At that time, there will be food stalls and various exhibitions and performances on both sides of the road, forming a lively scene. While watching the cherry blossoms fall, watching various local Korean folk performances. The annual Cherry Blossom Festival is a day that Seoul citizens look forward to, and they treat this day as a festival. The annual Cherry Blossom Festival lasts for about a week until all the cherry blossoms wither. When you come out of the subway station, you can see IFCMALL, and you can see the signs of the Cherry Blossom Festival along the way. Follow the direction and go out, opposite to Yeouido Park. The whole park is filled with pink atmosphere. Turn left from the park to the Han River. On the riverside, you can see the Cherry Blossom Avenue, with cherry blossoms in full bloom on both sides, very beautiful. Along the way, there will be a variety of cars selling different foods on both sides of the road. Walking to the middle of Cherry Blossom Avenue, you will even see various performances. This road is very long and there are many people, and it is often blocked there. If you don’t want to continue walking, you can also rest at the nearby Han River Park. Koreans like to bring blankets and food to the riverside for a picnic. There are also bicycle rentals in the park, including 2-person bicycles and 3-person bicycles. You will see many young couples in the car, laughing and laughing. In short, during the Cherry Blossom Festival, the entire Cherry Blossom Avenue is full of romantic atmosphere.

The Independent Gate is located next to the Ying En Gate, which was originally used to welcome foreign envoys. Ying En Gate is the place where the king personally greeted the Chinese envoys. Since 1897, Russia has declared Korea's independence to Japan and Russia, which have long threatened China and Korea. The cost of building the independent gate is donated by all the citizens. Now there are only two goalposts of Yingenmen left in front of the independent gate, but it can still make people imagine what it looked like at the time. Seeing the independent gate can not help but remind people of the Arc de Triomphe in Paris, France, because it imitates the architectural style of the Arc de Triomphe. The independent gate is made of granite and is 14.28 meters high, with road access below. The word "Independent Gate" is written in Korean on the independent door, and the Taiji flag is painted on both sides. On the left inner side of the independent door there are steps leading to the roof. Hibiscus flowers are planted around, and roads are built around the independent gate. You can see the style of the independent gate from the car.

address: 199 Everland-ro, Pogog-eup, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea
description: Caribbean Bay (Water Park) is located in Yongin City, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea, in the Everland Park.As the largest indoor and outdoor composite water park in Korea, tourists can enjoy water amusement facilities and hot spring baths here regardless of seasons.Enjoy an exciting adventure in an exotic Caribbean atmosphere!

Seoul Jungang Market is a traditional market located in Dongdaemun, a popular tourist spot. As one of the six traditional markets in Seoul, "Seoul Jungang Market" keeps pace with Dongdaemun Market and Namdaemun Market. It has always received a steady stream of customers and maintained a lively scene. The market is based on Sindang Market, which was built after the Korean War. It was renamed "Seoul Jungang Market" in 1962 and has a long history. The market has a wide variety of commodities, including fruits and vegetables, fresh food, furniture and daily necessities.
KT&G Imagination Space Design Plaza has an art cinema, concert space and galleries dedicated to experimental exhibitions, as well as a gift design shop on its ground floor.
